message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR 

The paper deals with video segmentation, which is a computer vision problem, and proposes a Markov Random Field model for unconstrained video segmentation. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also mentions the use of multiple cues and temporal smoothness, which are related to machine learning (cs.MM - Multimedia) and optimization (cs.LG - Machine Learning), respectively. Additionally, the paper proposes a novel approach to video segmentation, which can be considered as an application of artificial intelligence (cs.AI - Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper deals with the structure of a video, which can be related to graphics (cs.GR - Graphics).
